name: BookSelf App
description: I worked with a team of six developers to create this interactive book-borrowing website using several computing languages.

name: Pandemic Tracker
description: I created this global pandemic tracker using React Globe and an API hosted by John Hopkins that tracks Covid-19 cases, deaths, and recoveries.

name: Weather App
description: I built this weather app using Javascript, local storage, and Open Weather's API. Search a city to see current weather and a five-day forecast
